headline: Invesco (IVZ) Is Up 10.4% After Premium Preferred Buyback And LGT Tie-Up Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In recent days, Invesco Ltd. agreed to repurchase US$500 million of its 5.9% Series A preferred shares from major investor MassMutual at an 18% premium, while also entering a partnership with LGT Capital Partners to build multi-alternative private markets solutions for U.S. wealth and retirement clients. Together, these moves highlight management’s capital allocation priorities and a push to broaden higher-fee alternative offerings that could reshape Invesco’s revenue mix over time. Next,...
